column4: Maybe I am dumb ,but how to you play  dvd that are encrypted  ?
Just install the dvdcss package, and then just play the dvd and the software should do the rest.  Hang on, let me get the name of the dvdcss package...
It's "sudo apt-get install libdvdcss2" ... Oh, are other people getting "libdvdcss"?
Do you know how to add medibuntu to your repository sources?
